arts.ttl: Lyon ruthlessness vs Rangers laid bare by stunning xG return that makes for stark cutting edge comparison
arts.sum: The French side smashed home four goals beyond Jack Butland at Ibrox.

arts.ttl: Lyon trio have a 'blast' against Rangers as world media reacts to 'crazy match at Ibrox' in Europa League
arts.sum: It was a night to forget for Philippe Clement and his troops at Ibrox as they went down 4-1 on matchday two of the Europa League

arts.ttl: Philippe Clement rues Rangers '200% chances' as boss plays the numbers game after Lyon teach a finishing lesson
arts.sum: The Belgian was pleased with what his side created in Europa League clash but were given a finishing lesson

arts.ttl: Kris Boyd laughs through his Rangers pain before Celtic potshot gets him booed - what the pundits said
arts.sum: Boyd could only laugh after Lyon's second goal and at full-time, he turned the eventual defeat on rivals Celtic

arts.ttl: Lacazette scores wonder goal as Lyon punish Rangers in Europa League
arts.sum: Lyon captain Alexandre Lacazette scored a wonder goal as he and Malick Fofana scored twice in a punishing 4-1 Europa League defeat for Rangers at Ibrox.

arts.ttl: Rangers smoked by lethal Lyon and more punishment on the way as fans create the only Ibrox fireworks - 5 talking points
arts.sum: The Ligue 1 club's front three were too hot for Gers to handle and it could have been much worse than 4-1

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Rangers 1-4 Lyon: Attacking brilliance secures a second European win for Les Gones
arts.sum: Olympique Lyonnais were looking to make it two wins from two in the UEFA Europa League as they travelled to Glasgow to face Rangers. The Scottish side are a familiar…

arts.ttl: Rangers suffer heavy Europa League defeat at home to Lyon
arts.sum: Philippe Clement’s side had beaten Malmo in their opening fixture of the revamped competition.

arts.ttl: Ally McCoist blown away by Nedim Bajrami as Rangers winger pulls off the 'sensational' against Lyon
arts.sum: Bajrami took an impressive touch and McCoist couldn't believe it

arts.ttl: Lucas Perri undisturbed by the situation of Anthony Lopes at Lyon
arts.sum: According to L’Équipe, Lucas Perri (26) is not really disturbed by the treatment of fellow goalkeeper Anthony Lopes (34) at Olympique Lyonnais. The Brazillian stopper has replaced the Lyon academy graduate…
